name: YouTube™ motion tracking
description: YouTube™ AI extension for for animating videos

scripts.copyCSS: cp src/*.css dist/ && mkdir -p dist/themes && cp src/themes/*.css dist/themes/
scripts.copy: npm run copyManifest && npm run copyHTML && npm run copyImages && npm run copyCSS
scripts.build:parcel: npx parcel build src/*.html src/content.js src/background.js src/popup.js src/options.js --public-url ./ && npm run copy
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build:parcel

author: Mario M.
